Privacy Policy

Updated on: January 3, 2026

At LeadSystem360, we respect your privacy. We only collect basic information necessary to provide our services, such as your name, email address, and business details. This information is used solely for communication, service delivery, and support purposes.

We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties, except when required to operate our services or comply with legal obligations. All data is handled with reasonable care and used only in connection with our outbound and automation services.

By using our website or services, you agree to this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions, you can contact us at:

Email: [email protected]
